description:
Understand why you do what you do in less than 45 minutes!

This is a fun, quick course on how to understand yourself!

“There is only one corner of the universe you can be certain of improving, and that’s your own self.” – Aldous Huxley

Understanding yourself is super important especially in the busy, fast paced world we live in! By getting to know yourself better you can help your:


  • Decision making
  • Goal setting
  • Moods and emotions
  • Relationships with others
  • and much more!


In this course, I will guide you through understanding your specific personality type! You will learn all about the Myers-Briggs Type Indicator (MBTI) which will give you a four letter personality type. There are 16 types total and you are one of them! By understanding your type, the MBTI will tell you how your type functions in society, under stress, in careers, etc. When you understand why you think the way you do, it makes it easier to pick the best situations and paths in life specific to your type!


These are the 16 types:

ISTJ - ISFJ - INFJ - INTJ

ISTP - ISFP - INFP - INTP

ESTP - ESFP - ENFP - ENTP

ESTJ - ESFJ - ENFJ - ENTJ


You will also understand your cognitive functions. Everyone uses these functions to make decisions and analyze the world! There are functions you are strong at and ones you are weak at, and this course will clarify those for you!

These are all the cognitive functions you will learn about:


  • Introverted Thinking (Ti)
  • Extroverted Thinking (Te)
  • Introverted Feeling (Fi)
  • Extroverted Feeling (Fe)
  • Introverted Intuition (Ni)
  • Extroverted Intuition (Ne)
  • Introverted Sensing (Si)
  • Extroverted Sensing (Se)


In a nutshell, this course is for anyone who wants an interesting, scientific view on their personalities and on the personalities of the people around them!
title: Understanding Why You do what You do
